def_cn: (在所爱慕女子的窗下)为(其)唱(或演奏)小夜曲
def_en: If one person serenades another, they sing or play a piece of music for them. Traditionally men did this outside the window of the woman they loved.

def_cn: (古典音乐中为小型管弦乐队谱写的)组曲，小夜曲
def_en: In classical music, a serenade is a piece in several parts written for a small orchestra.
